name: DeMomentSomTres People
author: Marc Queralt

sections.description:
Lets you show all the people in your organization on a single page grouped by departments.

More information at http://demomentsomtres.com/english/wordpress-plugin-demomentsomtres-people/

Alternative usage demo at http://demomentsomtres.com/catala/marqueting-i-web-treballs-clients-projectes
sections.installation:
Upload the plugin.

Insert in your content using the shortcode [demomentsomtres-people].
sections.changelog: =1.3= * bug: nothing done on the same person in multiple departments =1.2= * bug: text box falls out of greater box * optimization for large screens =1.1= * text box moves with images =1.0= * Initial version

short_description: Lets you show all the people in your organization on a single page grouped by departments.
